li.p: Service clearance, front and rear: 30" [762 mm]
Ventilation clearance: min. 6" [152.4 mm] front, rear, and one side (can be either side)

body.p: Door Swing: The Bypass Cabinet can be on the left-hand (LH) or right-hand (RH) side of the combined unit as you face the unit. In LH units, front and rear doors are hinged on the left. In RH units, doors are hinged on the right. Door swing always opens from the center of the unit outward. Door Swing Measurements
